name: metacompany
description:
两人团，第一次制作模拟经营类游戏，我们的主要工作量放在了设计实现一个不小的数学系统，让游戏中那么多的参数能够合理运转起来，也是第一次感受到数值策划的地狱生活，还有让我们低估了工作量的UI部分，老实说经营模拟类作为一种点点点操作的游戏，ui上真的会杀死大量时间。

不足的感觉一是动态表现上，不仅包括场景不够生动，还有按钮反馈，还有单一镜头。
同时因为两人都是程序背景，又当策划又当美术，在这种美术同学很多的比赛里深深感到自己设计能力和场景能力的不足，想想又有了创作下一个作品的欲望，很开心吼。The two-person team is the first time to make a simulation business game. Our main workload is to design and implement a large mathematical system, so that so many parameters in the game can operate reasonably, and it is the first time to feel the value The hell life of planning, and the UI part that makes us underestimate the workload, to be honest, running a simulation class as a little bit of operation game really kills a lot of time on the UI.

One of the shortcomings is the dynamic performance, not only the scene is not vivid enough, but also the button feedback, and a single shot.
At the same time, because both of them have programming backgrounds, they are both planners and artists. In this competition with many art students, they deeply feel their lack of design ability and scene ability. Thinking about the desire to create the next work, I am very happy. Roar.
